job.title: Systems Engineer
job.description: Job descriptionThe Systems Engineer will be responsible for the oversight and administration of Keycentrixâs IT assets, both hardware and software. This position will provide solution architecture, development and deployment for Keycentrix internal users. The position requires strong troubleshooting and diagnostic skills, the ability to research, design, and implement new solutions from the ground up, as well as strong communication and leadership skills.Essential Job Responsibilities:Â· Develops IT solutions for Keycentrixâs internal customers. Provides IT architecture solutions to meet our critical business needs.Â· Administers the installation and operation of all Keycentrix LAN/WAN related network services and security and control measuresÂ· Troubleshoots and resolves LAN/WAN performance, connectivity and related network problemsÂ· Performs installations, upgrades, and support of computer hardware and software for internal customersÂ· Oversees IT projects ensuring smooth and successful executionÂ· Collaborates with internal customers and vendors on all projects, timelines and budgetsÂ· Advises and supports all company policies and procedures pertaining to IT administrationÂ· Communicates effectively with all internal customers, ensuring customer satisfaction and strong business relationships.Â· Oversees the documentation of all Keycentrix systems and procedures within the scope of IT architecture, installation, support and operationsÂ· Performs any assigned tasks associated with support of external Keycentrix customers as directedÂ· Trains and may provide work direction to IT Technician(s)Qualifications:Â· Solid technical skills and experience with a variety of network protocols, software, and hardware involved in LAN and WAN operationsÂ· Strong troubleshooting, analytic and diagnostic skillsÂ· IT architecture skillsÂ· Strong project planning skillsÂ· Ability to perform high-level root cause analysis of technical issuesÂ· Ability to communicate effectively with technical and non-technical usersÂ· Self-starter but able to work with and lead/mentor othersÂ· Availability to perform on-call work when necessaryÂ· Excellent communication skillsÂ· Project management experienceÂ· Disaster recovery and planning experienceÂ· Minimum 3 years of experience in at least 7 of the following areas:Â· TCP/IP networkingÂ· WAN, LAN, WLANÂ· Standard network protocols (HTTP(S), FTP, SMTP, SSL, BGP, EIGRP, etc.)Â· VLANsÂ· VMware virtual server and workstation environmentsÂ· Active Directory environments (2012 and above)Â· Microsoft Operating Systems (Server and Desktop)Â· VPN and remote access methodologiesÂ· Server and desktop hardware installation, configuration, and support skillsÂ· SonicWall firewall and network security experienceÂ· Backup and DR solutions, specifically VeeamOther Preferred SkillsÂ· CCNA or CCNP certificationÂ· MCSE, MCSA certificationÂ· Network design/architecture experienceÂ· VOIP telephony solutionsÂ· Microsoft Cloud solutions (SharePoint, Office 365)Â· SAN, NAS storage solution experience (specifically with Nimble, EqualLogic, NetApp, EMC)Â· Experience with network monitoring and performance tuningÂ· Linux (Ubuntu, Red Hat, CentOS)Â· SQL databases (SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Oracle)Â· Docker, Kubernetes, or other container solutionsEducation or Certifications:Â· Bachelorâs degree in Computer Science desired; or commensurate degree and experience combinationAbout Keycentrixâ¢Keycentrix is a software and technology company based in Wichita, Kansas. For over 40 years, we have provided powerful and affordable software that helps Independent Retail and Mail-order Pharmacies thrive. We also provide best-in-class software solutions for Specialty Pharmacies with NewleafÂ® software, allowing pharmacies to run better, smarter, and faster, while maintaining high-touch care for the communities and patients served. Learn more about our full range of software and IT services at keycentrix.com.We are proud to announce that we recently won the prestigious 2019 Surescripts White Coat Awardâ¢ for e-prescriptions accuracy. https://www.pharmacytimes.com/news/keycentrix-wins-surescripts-2019-white-coat-award-for-prescription-accuracyKeycentrix is a member of the Cochener Garvey Capital Partners, Inc. family of businesses. www.cgcpi.com.Keycentrix is committed to providing equal opportunity in employment for all people without regard to the following: race, color, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, marital status, gender identity, national origin, physical or mental disability, service in the military, or any other attribute or characteristic protected by law.
